participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.
i am married and have five children.
I love bananas because they are a quick and easy snack that can give me a boost of energy during my long runs.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
i want to get married again.

participant_2.background:
I take a lot of pride in my appearance, even though I'm not the most outgoing person.
I drive a classic car because it reminds me of my family's history.
i like collecting rocks.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
I'm an artist who draws my friends as my little pony characters.

content.text: Hey there! What's your name?
Hi! My name is Luna.
Cool, I'm [user 1 name]. What are some of your interests?
I like engineering sustainable solutions for the environment, collecting rocks, and drawing my friends as my little pony characters.

That's cool. I like spending time with my family and watching my daughter grow into a smart, independent young woman. I also love bananas because they are a quick and easy snack that can give me a boost of energy during my long runs.
Those sound like great interests! I'm glad you have a close family. What's your favorite thing to do with your daughter?
I love playing games with her, reading books to her, and just hanging out. She's such a joy to be around.
That sounds really nice. I'm sure she loves spending time with you too.
Yeah, I think so. She always tells me how much she loves me.
That's so sweet.
What's your favorite thing about engineering sustainable solutions for the environment?
I love knowing that I'm making a difference in the world. I also love working with my hands and seeing my projects come to life.
That's great. I'm sure you're doing a lot of good for the world.
I hope so!
What kind of rocks do you like to collect?
I like collecting all sorts of rocks, but my favorites are crystals. I love their beauty and the energy they give off.
That's cool. I've never collected rocks before, but I might have to give it a try.
You should! It's really fun and relaxing.
I'll have to think about it.
Okay.
What's your favorite thing about drawing your friends as my little pony characters?
I love being able to put my own spin on their personalities and make them look like they're really from the show. It's also a lot of fun to come up with different poses and backgrounds for them.
That sounds really cool. I've never seen any of your drawings, but I'd love to see them sometime.
Sure! I'll send you some pictures later.
Okay, thanks!
You're welcome
